product_name: Benchmade 551 Griptilian G10 Special Edition Knife - Straight Edge
long_description: A cinch to use, the lightweight Benchmade 551 Griptilian G10 Knife features a tough stainless-steel, straight-edge blade, molded handle and smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism. S30V stainless-steel blade is strong and sharp enough to slice through food, wire and ropes with ease. Strong, spring-loaded AXIS locking mechanism adjusts smoothly for ease of operation. Ambidextrous blade is easily opened with a simple push of the thumb-stud openers. Textured and contoured G10 handle is lightweight and easy to grip; features lanyard hole for an alternate carry option (lanyard not included). Benchmade 551 Griptilian G10 Knife has a reversible pocket clip that makes storage and transport easy-just clip it on your pocket or belt and go.
short_description: A cinch to use, the lightweight Benchmade 551 Griptilian G10 Knife features a tough stainless-steel, straight-edge blade, molded handle and smooth AXIS(TM) locking mechanism.
